message.tenebrous.insufficient: You cannot conjure any more shadows at this time.
message.tenebrous.user: You feel a shadow seep out from your body...
message.profound.victim: You suddenly feel too serene to speak.
message.profound.chat_enabled: You snap out of your trance, and may speak again.
message.benevolent.user: You feel a surge of empathy...
message.benevolent.no_entities: No one around in need of reaching out.
death.attack.benevolent_damage: %s gave until there was nothing left to give
message.parsimonious.user: You feel a surge of antipathy...
message.unconscionable.2: %s attempted chicken cannibalism, much to the chicken's chagrin
message.unconscionable.3: %s failed to escape the elephant-sized glue trap
message.unconscionable.4: Maybe %s shouldn't have angered that shopkeeper
message.hearsay.user: You begin eavesdropping on a different reality...
message.hearsay.use_end: Your ears snap back to this universe.
message.heresy.snap: You feel your connection to the heavens is on the brink of severing.
message.heresy.snapping: You feel your connection to the heavens sever...
message.heresy.snapped: The flames of heresy consume you!
message.heresy.weaken: You feel your connection to the heavens weaken...
message.hearsay.forgiveness: The grace of the heavens briefly returns...
message.perspicacious.glub: You feel as though your leg has become more hollow.
message.perspicacious.blug: You feel as if this tonic should be consumed in moderation.
message.seraphic.command: Flee to the hills, and do not look back.
message.seraphic.damage: Do not look back, lest you be swept away.
death.attack.seraphic_damage: %s did not heed the heavens, and was turned into a pillar of basalt
message.atomized.risky: You feel the need to let off some radioactive steam...
